evidence.claim: SimpleTrials uses AWS services including Lambda and RDS for their infrastructure.
The platform complies with HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure handling of health data.
Integration of FHIR standards allows for seamless data exchange with EHR systems.
Supported various healthcare transaction sets including X12 for billing and claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse functionalities found.
